text: Aleksei Ivanovich Bolshakov (; born 25 May 1966) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Energiya Volzhsky players Category:FC Rotor Volgograd players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:FC Mordovia Saransk players Category:FC Zhenis Astana players Category:Association football defenders
title: Aleksei Bolshakov
